wordquizzle.wqserver

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • wordquizzle.wqserver.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    The User class describes a WordQuizzle user.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  User.AlreadyFriendsException
      Runtime exception thrown when the two users are already friends.
